mapper.select: select * from jbxx_bk order by tjrq,xh;

select a.bkmc,b.maxtjrq,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,b.maxtjrq,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')) as deltadays from ( select distinct(bkmc) as bkmc from jbxx_bk ) a left join ( select max(tjrq) as maxtjrq,bkmc from jbxx_bk where xh < 5 group by bkmc ) b on a.bkmc = b.bkmc order by deltadays desc
